title: Global CDMO
description: A global CDMO in pharmaceutical manufacturing providing process development and cGMP production in cell culture, microbial fermentation and gene therapies.
cleaned_text: Advancing Tomorrow´s Medicines As your global CDMO partner we offer complete solutions in pharmaceutical manufacturing - from pre-clinical investigations and process development to commercial cGMP production. [Learn more](https://fujifilmdiosynth.com/about-us/) OUR VISION To be the leading and most trusted global Contract Development and Manufacturing Organization in the biopharmaceutical industry. We're looking for people who share our passion, drive, and energy - what we call Genki - to join our team. [Explore career opportunities](https://fujifilmdiosynth.com/careers/) WHAT WE DO Cell Culture Premium services in cell line development and process development for earlier access to cGMP production has kept us a leading provider of cell culture solutions to the biopharmaceutical industry for over 30 years. [Cell Culture Services](https://fujifilmdiosynth.com/cell-culture/) WHAT WE DO Microbial Fermentation High-titer production processes for the efficient microbial expression of recombinant proteins and commercial cGMP manufacturing, based on a robust, proven and scalable platform: pAVEwayTM. [Microbial Fermentation Services](https://fujifilmdiosynth.com/microbial-fermentation/) WHAT WE DO Cell and Gene Therapy Services We are a global service provider of cell and gene therapy and viral vaccine products - with world-class cGMP compliant facilities that offer effective and reliable production. [Cell and Gene Therapy Services](https://fujifilmdiosynth.com/cell-and-gene-therapy-services/) Proud Members of FUJIFILM As proud members of the FUJIFILM family with a world-wide presence, we are one of the leading and most trusted global contract development and manufacturing organization in the biopharmaceutical industry. We can be your partners for life.
